description: Why bake a cake when you can use fresh watermelon to create a stunning dessert? This spectacular centrepiece will steal the show at your next feast.
name: Watermelon & Berry Hack Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g white grapes, cut into small bunches

recipeInstructions.text: Trim rounded ends off melons so they sit flat. Cut 1 watermelon into a 13cm-high x 13cm-wide circle. Cut remaining watermelon into a 12cm-high x 12cm-wide circle. Cut melonball into a 12cm-high x 10cm-wide circle.
On a board, stack melons from largest to smallest to form a three-tiered cake. Decorate by using toothpicks to secure berries, grapes and mint to cake. Serve.
